title: Total U.S. hay production 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Production in thousand tons has stayed the same over the Year.
Production in thousand tons is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Production in thousand tons, about 135002.0 was reported at Year 2013
The lowest Production in thousand tons, of value 117072.0 was reported at Year 2012
